speaker: David Dyckman
title: The Latest from Azure Video Indexer
description:
David Dyckman and Yonit Hoffman join Cassie for an overview of Azure Video Indexer product followed by a focus/demo on how Audio and Video content comes together to create Video Indexer insights like Topic, Keywords, Brands, and others. 

Chapters:
00:00 Livestream begins
00:17 Welcome to the AI Show
00:53 What is Azure Video Indexer
02:35 How customers use Azure Video Indexer
06:27 Demo
14:09 How it works
19:26 Get started today https://aka.ms/aviportal
21:02 How AVI uses Responsible AI
22:02 Learn more
